Get started

Source: vignettes/get-started.Rmd
get-started.Rmd
library(tidypptsda)

preprocess_data 

result_nedap <- preprocess_data(data = mintyr::nedap, station_type = "nedap", quiet = TRUE)
head(result_nedap)

clean_weight_get 

result_nedap <- preprocess_data(data = mintyr::nedap, station_type = "nedap", quiet = TRUE)
clean_weight <- clean_weight_get(result_nedap, my_break = c(30,120), quiet = TRUE)
head(clean_weight)

adg_get 

result_nedap <- preprocess_data(data = mintyr::nedap, station_type = "nedap", quiet = TRUE)
adg_result <- adg_get(result_nedap, my_break = c(30,120), quiet = TRUE)
head(adg_result$adg_info)

adfi_get 

result_nedap <- preprocess_data(data = mintyr::nedap, station_type = "nedap", quiet = TRUE)
adg_result <- adg_get(result_nedap, my_break = c(30,120), quiet = TRUE)
adfi_result <- adfi_get(result_nedap, adg_result, quiet = TRUE)
head(adfi_result$adfi_info)
#>    responder location origin_dfi corrected_dfi
#>       <char>   <char>      <num>         <num>
#> 1:     13913      101   2535.959      2560.189
#> 2:     13918      101   2319.814      2307.572
#> 3:     13935      102   2703.371      2704.603
#> 4:     13954      101   2317.260      2307.228
#> 5:     13996      101   2909.309      2921.705
#> 6:     14260      102   2846.546      2822.715
head(adfi_result$adfi_data)
#> Key: <responder, seq_days>
#>    responder location       date seq_days origin_dfi corrected_dfi  state
#>       <char>   <char>     <Date>    <int>      <int>         <num> <char>
#> 1:     13913      101 2024-02-19        1          1      896.8517   elrp
#> 2:     13913      101 2024-02-20        2        677      677.0000    org
#> 3:     13913      101 2024-02-21        3        661      661.0000    org

adg_plot 

result_nedap <- preprocess_data(data = mintyr::nedap, station_type = "nedap", quiet = TRUE)
adg_result <- adg_get(result_nedap, my_break = c(30,120), quiet = TRUE)
res <- adg_plot(data = adg_result, save_path = tempdir(), location = "101", quiet = TRUE)
# Check exported files
list.files(path = tempdir(), pattern = "png", recursive = TRUE)
#> [1] "loc_101_grow.png"
# Clean up exported files
files <- list.files(
  path = tempdir(),         # Default export directory
  pattern = "png",          # File type pattern to search
  recursive = TRUE,         # Search in subdirectories
  full.names = TRUE         # Return full file paths
)
file.remove(files)          # Remove all exported files
#> [1] TRUE

adfi_plot 

result_nedap <- preprocess_data(data = mintyr::nedap, station_type = "nedap", quiet = TRUE)
adg_result <- adg_get(result_nedap, my_break = c(30,120), quiet = TRUE)
adfi_result <- adfi_get(result_nedap, adg_result, quiet = TRUE)
res <- adfi_plot(data = adfi_result, save_path = tempdir(), location = "101", quiet = TRUE)
# Check exported files
list.files(path = tempdir(), pattern = "png", recursive = TRUE)
#> [1] "loc_101_adfi.png"
# Clean up exported files
files <- list.files(
  path = tempdir(),         # Default export directory
  pattern = "png",          # File type pattern to search
  recursive = TRUE,         # Search in subdirectories
  full.names = TRUE         # Return full file paths
)
file.remove(files)          # Remove all exported files
#> [1] TRUE

fcr_get 

result_nedap <- preprocess_data(data = mintyr::nedap, station_type = "nedap", quiet = TRUE)
adg_result <- adg_get(result_nedap, my_break = c(30,120), quiet = TRUE)
adfi_result <- adfi_get(result_nedap, adg_result, quiet = TRUE)
fcr_result <- fcr_get(adg_res = adg_result, adfi_res = adfi_result, quiet = TRUE)
head(fcr_result$fcr_res)
#> Key: <responder, location>
#>    responder location  stage start_date_cut min_weight_cut end_date_cut
#>       <char>   <char> <char>         <Date>          <num>       <Date>
#> 1:     13913      101 30-120     2024-03-02       30500.00   2024-05-16
#> 2:     13918      101 30-120     2024-03-07       29846.15   2024-05-24
#> 3:     13935      102 30-120     2024-02-28       31388.89   2024-05-09
#> 4:     13954      101 30-120     2024-02-25       35250.00   2024-05-23
#> 5:     13996      101 30-120     2024-02-27       32136.36   2024-05-06
#> 6:     14260      102 30-120     2024-02-23       31437.50   2024-05-07
#>    max_weight_cut  lm_slope r_squared stage_days      adg origin_dfi
#>             <num>     <num>     <num>      <num>    <num>      <num>

import_nedap 

# Example: CSV file import demonstrations

# Setup test files
csv_files <- mintyr::mintyr_example(
  mintyr::mintyr_examples("csv_test")     # Get example CSV files
)

import_nedap(filepaths = csv_files)
#> â„¹ Using package data.table to import 2 files.
#> âœ” Successfully imported data from 2 files

#> 3:     6      e   TRUE
#> 4:    15      o  FALSE
